extendedInfo.description: *******************************This is the Free Version of Guilt.It's ad supported and much of the App's features aren't working. For a full list of them, please scroll down.You can buy the full app here: http://goo.gl/x7eOh*******************************With Guilt you can keep an eye on your Expenses in simple and funny way!With a simple and colorful design, Guilt is perfect to all those who want to keep a track of how much money they spent and where they spent it, even the ones who don't like expense managers.Unlike other expense managers on the market, Guilt uses a "twist" to help you keep an habit of writing down your expenses: instead of adding your expense with boring categories, add your expense by the Guilt that the expense makes you feel.After writing down your expenses, you can see how you're spending your money during the Week, Month and Year.Guilt is also optimized for Phones & 7" Tablets, like the Nexus 7.You can start using the free version and after you decide to buy the Full App (thanks for that) export and import your expenses. The Paid version also brings Multi-device sync through Dropbox.Manage your money and see if you are Guilty of spending it where you shouldn't!---What does the full version bring you that the free version doesn't?- Ads removed- Ability to choose a different Currency and Date Format other than the System Default- Expense Summaries by Week, Month & Year and the ability to see this info from another time frame- Ability to choose a different Date when you create and edit an Expense- Dropbox Sync (which enables multi-device sync)- Widgets (Homescreen and Lockscreen)

reviews.title: Nice look and great layout
reviews.comment: Too basic or not it looks pretty. Great layout and colors. I really like it.
reviews.author: Aleksander Piotrowski

reviews.title: No organization
reviews.comment: can\'t separate different entries into different categories. way too basic
reviews.author: Damal John

reviews.title: Creative but not very useful
reviews.comment: Adding expenses without having any balance doesn\'t really help justify the weight of different expenses.
reviews.author: Adam Webb

reviews.title: You\'d have to deal with a lot of ads though
reviews.comment: Great app! Now I can feel the weight of my expenses and feel horrible about myself
reviews.author: Julius Jay Sambo

reviews.title: Forces closes
reviews.comment: Force closes when trying to add an item on the Nexus 7, but works fine on my Galaxy S1.
reviews.author: Christian Bermejo

reviews.title: FC on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: I tried it on my RAZR MAXX and it was great, though. It\'s a shame it doesn\'t work on my tablet. Nice holo design and a clever idea.
reviews.author: Oscar Garcia

reviews.title: What is the point of the free version if you can\'t do anything?!
reviews.comment: Un installed due to not even being able to do anything except add a color, name and value. Nothing else.  Please consider the free version being a trial period of 5 days or something like that.
reviews.author: Z Kent Yousif
